creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
mbenson@apache.org
text:
dieOnCircularReference() exists on the superclass, org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType, and was added 
with Ant 1.7.0.  You almost certainly have two versions of Ant on your classpath, or some similar problem.  
If you cannot diagnose it, please bring it to the userlist.

Thanks!
